---
title: "Country Analysis: Canada"
---

This explores how life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population changed in Canada over time.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")
canada = df[df["country"] == "Canada"]

plt.figure()
plt.plot(canada["year"], canada["life_expectancy"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Canada Life Expectancy Over Time")
plt.show()
```
